name: ORS General Users and Role Access
description:
This report is aimed at Local System Administrators in prisons who need to maintain the users with access to their establishment. The report returns details of the staff who have access to a particular establishment in P-NOMIS and any assigned roles. The report only returns information regarding non-administrative accounts (i.e. 'GENERAL' type accounts)and also only returns staff with access to less than 30 establishments in order to exclude Live Services and HQ users.
UAR0001 - v00.00.04 Last Modified: 12/12/12

dataset.name: Users and Roles
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME, AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME, AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID, AT_STATUS_REF.DESCRIPTION, AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME, AT_OMS_ROLES.ROLE_CODE, AT_OMS_ROLES.ROLE_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.USER_CASELOAD_ROLES AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_MEMBERS AT_STAFF_MEMBERS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.OMS_ROLES AT_OMS_ROLES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_STATUS_REF WHERE (AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID = AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.ROLE_ID = AT_OMS_ROLES.ROLE_ID (+)) AND (AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.CASELOAD_ID = AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME = AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME) AND (AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.USERNAME) AND (AT_STATUS_REF.DOMAIN = 'STAFF_STATUS') AND (AT_STATUS_REF.CODE = AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STATUS) AND (AT_STATUS_REF.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_USER_TYPE = 'GENERAL') AND (AT_STATUS_REF.CODE IN (SELECT STAFF_STATUS FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Staff Status (All for all)','A','Staff\Staff Status Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT STAFF_STATUS FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Staff Status (All for all)','A','Staff\Staff Status Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */)) AND AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT CASELOAD_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Caseload Id','A','Accounts\Account Caseload Id',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_AGENCY_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT CASELOAD_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Caseload Id','A','Account Caseload Roles\Account Caseload Code',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND NOT AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID IN (SELECT AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.USER_CASELOAD_ROLES AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES, OMS_OWNER.USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_MEMBERS AT_STAFF_MEMBERS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.OMS_ROLES AT_OMS_ROLES WHERE (AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID = AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.ROLE_ID = AT_OMS_ROLES.ROLE_ID (+)) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME = AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME) AND (AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = AT_USER_CASELOAD_ROLES.USERNAME) AND AT_OMS_ROLES.ROLE_CODE IN ('807', '900S', '720')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, STAFF_ID, DESCRIPTION, USERNAME, ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NAME FROM dataset_base_)
